021import net.md_5.bungee.api.plugin.Plugin;
022import net.tnemc.bungee.event.MessageListener;
023import net.tnemc.bungee.event.PlayerConnectListener;
024import net.tnemc.bungee.message.MessageManager;
025
026/**
027 * BungeeCore
028 *
029 * @author creatorfromhell
030 * @since 0.1.2.0
031 */
032public class BungeeCore extends Plugin {
033
034  private static BungeeCore instance;
035  private MessageManager manager;
036
037  public static BungeeCore instance() {
038
039    return instance;
040  }
041
042  @Override
043  public void onEnable() {
044
045    instance = this;
046
047    this.manager = new MessageManager(new BungeeProxy());
048
049    getProxy().registerChannel("tne:balance");
050    getProxy().registerChannel("tne:sync");
051    getProxy().registerChannel("tne:message");
052    getProxy().getPluginManager().registerListener(this, new MessageListener());
053    getProxy().getPluginManager().registerListener(this, new PlayerConnectListener());
054  }
055}
